name: Manoj Kumar
title: Frontend Developer
bio: Greetings! I'm Manoj, a dedicated Frontend Developer renowned for sculpting remarkable digital experiences. With an unwavering commitment to precision and a profound passion for unraveling complex challenges, I specialize in breathing life into websites and web applications by seamlessly blending artistic creativity with rock-solid technical prowess.

projects.title: Habits Tracker
projects.description: Track daily habits and build consistency with a clean, responsive UI.

projects.title: BuyBUSY Shop
projects.description: E-commerce storefront with product listings and cart experience.

projects.title: Book Reviewer
projects.description: App to review and rate books with simple submission flow.

projects.title: Photo Folio
projects.description: A minimal photo portfolio to showcase albums and shots.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Track monthly expenses with neat visual summaries.

projects.title: Meals App
projects.description: Browse meals and recipes with category filters.

projects.title: Shopping Cart
projects.description: Simple shopping cart demo with add/remove and totals.

projects.title: Storm Sense (Weather)
projects.description: Live weather widget with city search and current conditions.

projects.title: Movie App
projects.description: Discover and rate movies with a responsive, card-based UI.

projects.title: Node.js Authentication
projects.description: Auth boilerplate with sessions and secure flows.

experience.description: Worked extensively on bulk uploading creatives, creating campaigns, ad sets, and ads with full-featured functionality. Contributed to AI-integrated image/video signal gateways, payment and subscription integrations, ad rules, bid multipliers, and bot nullifiers, among other advanced features.

Built responsive web applications with React.js and Redux. Implemented component-based architectures, API integrations, and dynamic UI using Material-UI. Focused on performance optimization, cross-browser compatibility, and clean code practices.

Enhanced UI/UX, implemented responsive modules, and integrated APIs using React.js, Redux, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Contributed to backend with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, including secure auth and data handling. Improved performance and release workflows in agile.

education.description: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science; strong foundation in computer science and technology.
Completed 11th and 12th at Vidhyadri PU College; groundwork for pursuing Science and CS.
Graduated SSLC in 2015; strong base for academic journey and personal growth.
